name: tiny_spawn_05
text: Who breathes life into these old stones?

text: Sticks and stones will break their bones!

name: tiny_death_01
text: You can get blood from a stone.

name: tiny_death_06
text: Make a henge from my stones.

name: tiny_death_11
text: Bigger they are, the harder they fall.

name: tiny_kill_03
text: Here's a carbon footprint for ya.

text: You made your bedrock, now die in it.

text: Knocked ya back to the stone age.

text: You were as abrasive as sandstone.
text_simple: you were as abrasive as sandstone

text: You got rocks in your head.

name: tiny_kill_10
text: You just fell on hard times.

name: tiny_respawn_06
text: Between a rock and a dead place.
text_simple: between a rock and a dead place

name: tiny_respawn_07
text: One stone... Got two birds in mind.
text_simple: one stone got two birds in mind

name: tiny_rare_01
text: Why do they call it the Mineral Kingdom? We don't even have a king.
text_simple: why do they call it the mineral kingdom we dont even have a king

name: tiny_rare_03
text: My enemies break upon me like surf upon the stone.
text_simple: my enemies break upon me like surf upon the stone

name: tiny_rare_04
text: Was I a splinter from a golem's heel? A chip from the Oracular Visage of Garthos? I shall not rest until I know from whence I came.
text_simple: was i a splinter from a golems heel a chip from the oracular visage of garthos i shall not rest until i know from whence i came

name: tiny_battlebegins_01
text: The road ahead looks rocky, but that's all right with me.
text_simple: the road ahead looks rocky but thats all right with me

name: tiny_scepter_02
text: Would you look at that? Scepter.

name: tiny_rival_01
text: I think you bit off more than you can chew, Lifestealer.
text_simple: i think you bit off more than you can chew lifestealer

name: tiny_rival_02
text: My life is too big to be stolen.
text_simple: my life is too big to be stolen

name: tiny_rival_03
text: I thought you were made of rock like me, but I guess it was only chalk.
text_simple: i thought you were made of rock like me but i guess it was only chalk

name: tiny_rival_04
text: Whatever rock you're made of seems to be delicate stuff.
text_simple: whatever rock youre made of seems to be delicate stuff

name: tiny_rival_05
text: Huh huh ha, your wispy little friends couldn't save you, huh?
text_simple: huh huh ha your wispy little friends couldnt save you huh

name: tiny_rival_06
text: That's for all the times you skipped me on the river.
text_simple: thats for all the times you skipped me on the river

name: tiny_rival_07
text: Ha ha ha, sorry, I thought you liked to jump.
text_simple: ha ha ha sorry i thought you liked to jump

name: tiny_rival_08
text: When I tell you to jump, I say how high.
text_simple: when i tell you to jump i say how high

name: tiny_rival_09
text: Did I put a hole in your hull?
text_simple: did i put a hole in your hull

name: tiny_rival_10
text: You're not such a crack shot, Sniper.
text_simple: youre not such a crack shot sniper

name: tiny_rival_12
text: Aw, Medusa, I thought you were gonna help me make friends.
text_simple: aw medusa i thought you were gonna help me make friends

name: tiny_rival_13
text: What the heck? He's soft on the inside.
text_simple: what the heck hes soft on the inside

name: tiny_rival_14
text: Nothing personal, Ancient. Some of my best friends are fossils.
text_simple: nothing personal ancient some of my best friends are fossils

name: tiny_rival_15
text: Rocks have no enemy but time.
text_simple: rocks have no enemy but time

text: First Blood...from a stone. Ha ha ha ha!
text_simple: first blood from a stone ha ha ha ha

name: tiny_firstblood_02
text: First Blood! Better yours than mine.

text: Ha ha ha! Now you're really in trouble.

text: No matter how I grow and change, Little Roc remains a steadfast friend.
